Name: Four Course Combat
About the game: Four Course Combat is an unique side platformer that brings food to life . Beautiful 2D pixel art graphics , and awesome 8-bit retro music make this adventure epic!!!! Minimal dialogue Action packed game, suitable for all ages. Choose between 4 diverse characters! Use your spoon to smash or flip enemies, and throw forks to destroy enemies from a distance. You will face a food boss at the end of every level and battle their ingredients along the way.
